page.title: 14CLARE PARK
page.content: Clare Park is situated on the road to Farnham,_Crondall Lane.The whole area called Clare Park was built in George 2nd's time and since then has become a listed building.The main building, which is now an active Elderly Housing Association,has a history of being a school for many years, right up to the early 60's.In the 60's it was made into what it is today. In 1981,on the grounds of this building, a hospital was built.A private hospital with super facilities, bedroom with ensuite bathroom, own telephone, radio and colour TV in each room and excellent nursing staff. The grounds are mostly fields with many cattle on them.
